description: This header file defines a mock class `AVInputMock` implementing the `IAVInput` interface for testing purposes, along with several notification mock classes for the `IAVInput` related notifications. It includes mock methods for various functionalities related to audio-visual input management.

classes.name: AVInputMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the IAVInput interface for unit testing components that depend on AVInput functionality.

classes.name: DevicesChangedNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the IDevicesChangedNotification callback interface used in testing device change notifications.

classes.name: SignalChangedNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the ISignalChangedNotification callback interface used in testing signal change notifications.

classes.name: InputStatusChangedNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the IInputStatusChangedNotification callback interface used in testing input status change notifications.

classes.name: VideoStreamInfoUpdateNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the IVideoStreamInfoUpdateNotification callback interface used in testing video stream info updates.

classes.name: GameFeatureStatusUpdateNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the IGameFeatureStatusUpdateNotification callback interface used in testing game feature status updates.

classes.name: AviContentTypeUpdateNotificationMock
classes.description: Mock for the IAviContentTypeUpdateNotification callback interface used in testing AVI content type updates.

methods.name: RegisterDevicesChangedNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for device change notifications.

methods.name: UnregisterDevicesChangedNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the device change notification callback.

methods.name: RegisterSignalChangedNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for signal change notifications.

methods.name: UnregisterSignalChangedNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the signal change notification callback.

methods.name: RegisterInputStatusChangedNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for input status change notifications.

methods.name: UnregisterInputStatusChangedNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the input status change notification callback.

methods.name: RegisterVideoStreamInfoUpdateNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for video stream info updates.

methods.name: UnregisterVideoStreamInfoUpdateNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the video stream info update callback.

methods.name: RegisterGameFeatureStatusUpdateNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for game feature status updates.

methods.name: UnregisterGameFeatureStatusUpdateNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the game feature status update callback.

methods.name: RegisterAviContentTypeUpdateNotification
methods.description: Registers a callback for AVI content type updates.

methods.name: UnregisterAviContentTypeUpdateNotification
methods.description: Unregisters the AVI content type update callback.
